info.name: Prometheus_FXQualEngine
info.description: Postman collection for FX Qual Engine workflow + step metrics validation in Prometheus.

request.description:
Invoke FX Qualification using **WebClient** (reactive).

Use this to compare latency against RestClient.
Prometheus label will be:

`fxqual_workflow_duration_ms{clientType="web_client"}`

Useful for benchmarking client strategy performance.

Opens the Prometheus metrics scrape endpoint.

Search inside the output for:
- fxqual_workflow_duration_ms
- fxqual_step_duration_ms
- fxqual_method_invocations_total
- fxqual_promo_usage_total
- fxqual_volume_notional
- http_server_requests_seconds
